solution_line_template: Three eights of {total_players} players is ({older_35_fraction})*{total_players} = <<({older_35_fraction})*{total_players}={players_older_than_35}>>{players_older_than_35} players
The total number of players 25 or older is {players_25_to_35}+{players_older_than_35} = <<{players_25_to_35}+{players_older_than_35}={players_25_or_older}>>{players_25_or_older}
The number of players younger than 25 years is {total_players}-{players_25_or_older} = <<{total_players}-{players_25_or_older}={players_younger_than_25}>>{players_younger_than_25} players
